Package edu.ntnu.Backend.controller

Class AssignmentController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.Backend.controller.AssignmentController
@RequestMapping("/api") @RestController @CrossOrigin public class AssignmentController extends Object
A class that functions as the main controller for the api calls related to assignments.

  • Method Details

    • getAssignmentsForUserInASpecificSubject

      @PostMapping("user/assignments") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAssignmentsForUserInASpecificSubject(@RequestBody SubjectIdDTO subjectIdDTO)
      A method to get all assignments of a user in a specific subject
      Parameters:
      subjectIdDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See SubjectIdDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity containing the assignmentDAO objects if the user is a logged-in user, and Http status forbidden if a user is not logged-in.

    • changeAssignmentStatusOfAssignmentForUser

      @PostMapping("studass/assignment/status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity changeAssignmentStatusOfAssignmentForUser(@RequestBody UniqueIdDTO assignmentUserDTO)
      A method to change the status of the given assignment for a user. Only accessible to users with role studass or admin, not students.
      Parameters:
      assignmentUserDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See UniqueIdDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity containing information regarding whether the assignment was changed or not. Returns Http status forbidden if a user is not logged-in, or not of an allowed role.

    • getAllAssignmentsForAUserWithDifferentId

      @PostMapping("user/assignments/instance") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllAssignmentsForAUserWithDifferentId(@RequestBody InstancesOfUserInSubjectDTO instances)
      A method to get all assignments for a user given the token of another user.
      Parameters:
      instances - The specific format of data that is needed. See InstancesOfUserInSubjectDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns all the assignments for the specified user, or Http status forbidden if a user is not logged-in.

    • addAssignment

      @PostMapping("admin/addAsignment") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addAssignment(@RequestBody newAssignmentDTO newAssignmentDTO)
      A method for an admin to add an assignment to a subject.
      Parameters:
      newAssignmentDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See newAssignmentDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns nothing if the method works or Http status forbidden if a user is not logged-in or not of role admin.

    • getAssignmentIntervalForASpecificSubject

      @PostMapping("user/assignments/interval") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAssignmentIntervalForASpecificSubject(@RequestBody SubjectIdDTO subjectIdDTO)
      A method to get all assignment intervals in the specified subject.
      Parameters:
      subjectIdDTO - The specific format of data that is needed. See SubjectIdDTO for more information.
      Returns:
      Returns a response entity containing the assignmentIntervalDAO objects in its body. This method may also return Http status forbidden if a user is not logged-in.
